Class BasePVRecord

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
PVRecord, org.epics.pvData.pv.Requester
public class BasePVRecord
extends java.lang.Object

lockOtherRecord

public void lockOtherRecord(PVRecord otherRecord)
Description copied from interface: PVRecord
While holding lock on this record lock another record. If the other record is already locked than this record may be unlocked. The caller must call the unlock method of the other record when done with it.

Specified by:
lockOtherRecord in interface PVRecord
Parameters:
otherRecord - the other record.
